version_description:
! IMPORTANT: This version of Manager may require your XIM APEX's firmware be upgraded to use.

- New settings to optimize your aiming performance
- Additional languages support
- Audio fixes

For a complete list of improvements and XIM APEX firmware upgrade instructions, please visit: http://xim.tech/latest

Improved Bluetooth pairing and connection robustness.
Fixed issue where primary language set on phone/tablet not being used.
EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) compliance.

Updated to support features added in XIM APEX firmware 20190719 (see http://xim.tech/latest for details).
Added support for iOS 13.
This version of Manager will continue to work with all firmware versions.
